  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2401</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2401</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Around the British Isles</string>
            <string language="en">Around the British Isles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Um die britischen Inseln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Autour des îles britanniques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em torno dos isles britânicos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Intorno alle isole britanniche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γύρω από τα βρετανικά νησιά</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Webquest on els alumnes han de planificar un viatge pel Regne Unit i cercar informació en anglès per prendre decisions sobre itineraris, estades, preus, etc.</string>
            <string language="en">Webquest in which pupils must plan a journey around the British Isles and look for information in English to be able to decide on itineraries, places to stay, prices, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua estrangera</string>
            <string language="en">foreign language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua extranjera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">estada a l'estranger</string>
            <string language="en">stay abroad</string>
            <string language="es">estancia en el extranjero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">viatge d'estudis</string>
            <string language="en">study trip</string>
            <string language="es">viaje de estudios</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webquest, in dem Pupillen eine Reise um die 
britischen Inseln planen und nach Informationen auf englisch suchen 
müssen, um zu können, auf Reisewegen, den Plätzen zum zu bleiben, 
den Preisen, usw. zu entscheiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Webquest dans lequel les pupilles doivent 
projeter un voyage autour des îles britanniques et rechercher 
l'information en anglais pour pouvoir décider des itinéraires, des 
endroits à rester, des prix, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Webquest em que as pupilas devem planear uma 
viagem em torno dos isles britânicos e procurar a informação em 
inglês para poder  se decidir em itineraries, em lugares a 
permanecer, em preços, etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Webquest in cui le pupille devono progettare un 
viaggio intorno alle isole britanniche e cercare le informazioni in 
inglese per potere decidere degli itinerari, dei posti da rimanere, 
dei prezzi, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webquest στο οποίο οι μαθητές πρέπει να 
προγραμματίσουν ένα ταξίδι γύρω από τα βρετανικά νησιά και να 
ψάξουν τις πληροφορίες στα αγγλικά για να είναι σε θέση να 
αποφασίσουν σχετικά με τις περιηγήσεις, τις θέσεις να μείνουν, 
τις τιμές, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fremdsprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auslandsaufenthalt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studienreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langue étrangère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">séjour à l'étranger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voyage d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua extrangeira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estada no exterior</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desengate de estudo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lingua straniera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">soggiorno all'estero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">viaggio di studio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ξένη γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παραμονή στο εξωτερικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταξίδι μελέτης</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
